HEADING: Webhooks
PRODUCTION_NOTE_1: Ensure that you verify the "token" parameter in the request. This will be populated with your API secret, available here.
PRODUCTION_NOTE_2: When an invalid token is provided, return 401 Unauthorized.
PRODUCTION_NOTE_3: When a valid token is provided, return 200 OK.
PRODUCTION_NOTE_4: Not doing so will cause the integration to fail validation.
PRODUCTION_NOTE_5: Note that events are not immediate. There may be up to a minute delay as our system is asynchronous.
PRODUCTION_NOTE_6: If you do not return a 200 OK status code we will try again after minute. The delay increases by a minute after each failure for that event.
DOCUMENTATION_LINK_TEXT: For more documentation and the request structure, see here.
NOSCRIPT_MESSAGE: JavaScript is required for this UI to function properly.
RECENT_FAILURES_MESSAGE: You have recent webhook failures. Try checking the logs.
STATUS_NOT_VERIFIED_EXPECTED_200: ❌ Not verified. Expected status code of 200.
STATUS_NOT_VERIFIED_EXPECTED_401: ❌ Not verified. Expected status code of 401 when API key is invalid.
CONFIRM_SET_READY: This will manually set the webhook status as Ready, bypassing the API Key validation. Continue?
